tag_list: digital, media, digital-marketing, early-stage-technology-startup, startups, small-business-news, entrepreneurship-culture, online-magazine, young-entrepreneur, african-american-entrepreneur
overview:
Erica Nicole is an American business woman, serial entrepreneur, and syndicated columnist. She leads a diverse business portfolio across digital media, national speaking, global business development, and electronic equipment industries.

Erica is best known by the entrepreneurial community as the Founder and CEO of YFS Magazine: Young, Fabulous & Self-Employed (yfsmagazine.com) an internationally acclaimed and award-winning small business news site â€“ the definitive digital magazine for startup, small business news and entrepreneurial culture.

She has been featured and/or mentioned in national media outlets including Forbes.com, Portfolio.com, Fox Business, MSN Business on Main, The Huffington Post, Black Enterprise, American Express OPEN Forum, Business Insider, AllBusiness.com, Mashable, AOL.com, Supplier Diversity Review and many more.
